messages.title: INTOUCH
messages.content: Gemma Townsend is a passionate local resident, fighting to represent Lewisham Deptford as its next MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Conservatives will restore discipline in the classroom, raise standards in teaching and give parents more power.
Conservatives will restore the link between pensions and earnings and ensure no one has to sell their home for care.
Focus on patients not just performance indicators. Conservatives will increase spending on the NHS every year and ensure the drugs people need are available.
Community in Lewisham Centre and the local high streets. Conservatives will cut Labour's new job tax, abolish taxes that hinder small businesses and invest in entrepreneurs.
Conservatives will put more police on the streets and rehabilitate spend on form filling and invest in prisons cut the crime.

mentions.candidate: Gemma Townsend is playing an active role in our area as she's lived most of her life here.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Voting for another party like the Lib Dems or Greens will only help Gordon Brown cling to power for another five years. Conservatives need to win every seat they won in 2005 and gain an extra 117, just to have a majority of one MP in the House of Commons.
mentions.partyLeader: Gemma works in Boris Johnson’s team managing his crime policies
mentions.tacticalSituation: Conservatives need to win every seat they won in 2005 and gain an extra 117, just to have a majority of one MP in the House of Commons.

issues.economy: Conservatives will cut Labour's new job tax, abolish taxes that hinder small businesses and invest in entrepreneurs.
issues.education: Conservatives will restore discipline in the classroom, raise standards in teaching and give parents more power.
issues.health: Focus on patients not just performance indicators. Conservatives will increase spending on the NHS every year and ensure the drugs people need are available.
issues.socialWelfare: Conservatives will restore the link between pensions and earnings and ensure no one has to sell their home for care.

housing.content: Conservatives will ensure no one has to sell their home for care.

leaflet.personalStatement: Gemma Townsend is a passionate local resident, playing an active role in the area and is why I’m standing as your local Conservative candidate for Lewisham Deptford.

politicalExperience.achievements: Works in Boris Johnson's team managing his crime policies.
Volunteered with children and young offenders.

images.caption: Gemma Townsend with Boris Johnson and team

leaflet.additionalNotes: Gemma lives in Crofton Park, works in Boris Johnson’s team managing his crime policies and has worked in central and local government to improve schools and youth services. She is on the management board of Abbey Manor College in Lewisham and has volunteered with children and young offenders.
